item.description:
# User Object


| Argument              | Type   | Requirement | Description                                                                                      | Maximum Length |
| ----------------------| ------ | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------- |
| name                  | string | Required    | User's Name                                                                                      | 200            |
| password              | string | Required    | User's Password                                                                                  | 80             |
| password_confirmation | string | Required    | This field must match user's password                                                            | 80             |
| email                 | string | Required    | User's Email                                                                                     | 255            |
| type_id               | int    | Required    | Type of the user ('1' - Administrator, '2' - Deployer, '3' - Chain Manager, '4' - Venue Manager) | 10             |
| language              | string | Required    | 2 letter ISO language code (example - 'en')                                                      | 2              |
| company_id            | int    | Optional    | Company Id that this user belongs to                                                             | 10             |
| phone                 | string | Optional    | User's phone                                                                                     | 25             |

item.description:
A table represents a physical table, where a ticket can be opened, modified and closed (e.g. an order can be made or a ticket can be imported). A table is always assigned to one area, and cannot be reassigned to another area.

| Argument | Type    | Requirement | Description                                           | Maximum Length |
| -------- | ------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| number   | String  | Required    | Id number of the table                                | 30             |
| pos_id   | String  | Optional    | Id of a table on POS to which this table is connected | 30             |
| minor    | Integer | Required    | Minor of a beacon which is used to detect this table  | 5              |

item.description:
| Argument                     | Type    | Requirement | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Maximum Length |
| ---------------------------- | ------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| type_id                      | Integer | Required    | 1- Full-Service, 2 - Pick&Pay, 3 - Quick Service, 4 - Take-Out.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 5              |
| menu_id                      | Integer | Required    | The ID of Menu served in the Area.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 10             |
| pos_id                       | String  | Optional    | The ID of POS revenue center represented with the Area.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 255            |
| table_pos_id                 | String  | Optional    | The ID of POS table used for placing orders in "non-table" areas. Specific to Pick & Pay, Quick service and Take-out areas.                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 255            |
| minor                        | Integer | Optional    | Value of the Area's store beacon minor attribute. If omitted, minor will be assigned automatically as max store beacon minor for the given Venue + 1.                                                                                                                                                                                   | 5              |
| name                         | String  | Optional    | Name of the Area. If omitted "Default" will be used as Area name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 255            |
| state                        | Integer | Optional    | 1 - Enabled, 2 - Disabled, 3 - Auto-disabled                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 3              |
| singular_point_input_type    | String  | Optional    | The type of  table input. Valid input types are: "ManualInput", "TableBeacon". Specific to Full-service areas only. Default is "TableBeacon".                                                                                                                                                                                           | 255            |
| order_types                  | Array   | Optional    | ID list of of Order type objects stored in database. Not all order types  can be assigned to an Area : Full-Service area type can use only Dine-In and Payment-only order types,  Pick&Pay Area supports only Pick&Pay, Take-Out Area supports only Take-out, and Quick Service Area supports Quick Service and Preorder order types.   |                |
| properties.location_type     | string  | Optional    | Allowed values: 'table', 'seat', 'room'                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                |

request.description: Fetches all order types related to specified area
Fetches a specified order type

header.description: This is necessary for laravel to figure out the request is AJAX

request.description:
Search ordering history for the given venue. Parameters in the request body are used for order list filtering as follows:

| Attribute    | Type     | Requirement                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| ------------ | -------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| venues       | array    | Optional                                   | List of venue IDs for which the order search should be limited. If empty all venues can be taken into result.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| areas        | array    | Optional                                   | List of venue IDs for which the order search should be limited. If empty all areas can be taken into result.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| order_types  | array    | Optional                                   | List of order types for which the order search should be limited. Valid order type values: 1 - Dine-In, 2 - Payment-Only, 3- Pick & Pay, 4 - Preorder, 5 - Quick Service, 6 - Take-Out.                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| statuses     | array    | Optional                                   | List of order status for which the order search should be limited. Valid status values are: "Init", "Canceled", "SendTried", "Sent", "Ready", "Final", "Failed". If empty all statuses can be taken into result.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| code         | string   | Optional                                   | Limits the search only to orders that contain "code" as a substring in its code attribute.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| timeframe    | string   | Optional                                   | Timeframe for order search. Valid timeframe values are: "Today" - this day, "Yesterday" - previous day, "Week" - this week, "LastWeek" - previous week, "Month" - this month, "LastMonth" - previous month, "Year" - this year, "All" - from the beginning of time,  Custom timeframe attributes "time_from" and "time_to" override the "timeframe", attribute. Default timeframe is "All".   |
| time_from    | datetime | Optional (Required if time_to is given)    | Beginning of custom timeframe intreval. If "time_from" together with the "time_to" attribute overrides "timeframe" attribute. Valid format is "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss".                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| time_to      | datetime | Optional (Required if time_from is given)  | End of custom timeframe intreval. If "time_to" together with the  "time_from" attribute overrides "timeframe" attribute. Valid format is  "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss".                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| limit        | int      | Optional                                   | The limit for number of instances in serach result. There is no limit by default.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| offset       | int      | Optional                                   | Determines how many instances should be skipped from the result. Default is 0. In combination with "limit" useful for search result pagination.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| sort         | object   | Optional                                   | Object which attributes determine how the order search result should be sorted.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| sort.field   | string   | Optional                                   | The field by which the result should be sorted. Valid sort fields are: "id", "total", "order_type". Default sort field is "id".                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| sort.order   | string   | Optional                                   | Order that should be applied to the sort result. Valid sort orders are: "asc", "desc". Default sort order is "asc".                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

request.description:
An order can be partially refunded multiple times - as long as there exists non-refunded amount:

| Attribute             | Type    | Requirement | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| --------------------- | ------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| items                 | array   | Optional    | List of order items objects that are going to be refunded.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| items.order_item_id   | int     | Required    | ID of the order item that is to be refunded.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| items.quantity        | int     | Optional    | Quantity of order item to which refund is applied. It should be less or equal to non-refunded quantity for that order item. If omitted, default is 1.                                                                                                                      |
| items.modifiers       | array   | Optional    | List of order item's modifier IDs that are to be refunded. If present, only the modifier part of order item total price for the given  quantity will be refunded. If omitted the full order item amount (for the given quantity) will be refunded (including modifiers).   |
| service_charge        | boolean | Optional    | If true, the full remaining order's service charge amount will be refunded.                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| tip                   | boolean | Optional    | If true, the full order's tip amount will be refunded.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

request.description:
Stores Omnivore VenueIntegration if not exits, or updates existing, and returning Omnivore VenueIntegration object

# Venue Integration Object

| Atribute                        | Type   | Description                                              |
| ------------------------------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| pos_type                        | string | POS Type (example "micros 3700") |
| location_id                     | string | POS location Id                                          |
| menu_tender_type_id             | string | Tender Type Id                                           |
| cache_tender_type_id            | string | Cache Tender Type Id                                     |
| payment_status_item_id          | string | Payment Status Item Id                                   |
| in_venue_revenue_id             | string | In Venue Revenue Id                                      |
| in_venue_order_type             | string | In Venue Order Type                                      |
| takeout_revenue_id              | string | Takeout Revenue Id                                       |
| takeout_order_type              | string | Takeout Order Type                                       |
| tray_charge_item_id             | string | Tray Charge Item Id                                      |
| tray_charge_price_level_id      | string | Tray Charge Price Level Id                               |
| zero_price_modifier_id          | int    | POS's zero price modifier id                             |
| allow_multiple_table_tickets    | bool   | Determines whether every order placed through MENU app will create new ticket on POS or not. If value is true than every order creates new ticket.          |

item.description:
A tax class determines the tax rates that are applied to menu items and service charges, as well as its calculation method. Tax classes are managed on a venue-level.
One venue can have only one tax that applies to service charge. # Taxes Object | Atribute | Type | Requirement | Description | Maximum Length | | ----------------------------- | ------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |----------------| | name | string | Required | Name of the tax class | 255 | | inside_rate | decimal | Optional | Percentage rate that applies to any order type with consumption place "inside" | 0.00 - 99.99 | | outside_rate | decimal | Optional | Percentage rate that applies to any order type with consumption place "outside" | 0.00 - 99.99 | | applies_to_service_charges | int | Required | Defines if this tax class should be applied to service charges (includes tray charge). Only one tax class can have this enabled in a restaurant. - - '1' or '0' | n/a |

request.description:
Create a new modifier resource for the specified venue.

Three types of modifiers exist. The type_id values are as follows.

type_id 1 = SimpleModifier (this is the equivalent of v2 modifiers)

type_id 2 = ItemModifier (these are items that are being used as modifiers)

type_id 3 = CommentModifier (these are meant to handle preparation instructions as certain POS systems treat these different to modifiers. Price will always be set to 0)

item.description:
Endpoints for listing and handling modifiers

## Modifier Object

| Argument     | Type   | Requirement   | Description                             | Maximum Length |
| ------------ | ------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name         | int    | Required      | Name of the modifier                    | 100            |
| price        | int    | Required      | Price of the modifier                   | 10             |
| pos_id       | string | Optional      | POS id of the modifier                  | 100            |
| pos_name     | string | Optional      | Name of the modifier on the POS         | 100            |
| state        | int    | Default - '1' | State of the modifier (active/inactive) | 3              |
| translations | object | n/a           | Modifier's translations                 | n/a            |

item.description:
Endpoints related to venue Modifier Groups.

## Modifier Group Object

| Argument           | Type   | Requirement   | Description                                              | Maximum Length |
| ------------------ | ------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| type_id             | int    | Required      | type_id=1 Standard modifier group; type_id=2 Item specific modifier group                               | 5              |
| name               | string | Required      | Name of the modifier group                               | 100            |
| min_selected       | int    | Default - '0' | Minimum number of selected modifiers in the group        | 5              |
| max_selected       | int    | Default - '0' | Maximum number of selected modifiers in the group        | 5              |
| pos_max_selected   | int    | Default - '0' | Maximum number of selected modifiers on POS in the group | 5              |
| pos_id             | string | Optional      | POS of the modifier group                                | 100            |
| pos_name           | string | Optional      | POS name of the modifier group                           | 100            |
| translations       | object | Optional      | Translations object                                      | n/a            |
| state              | int    | Default - '1' | State of the modifier group (enabled/disabled)           | 3              |

item.description:
Endpoints related to # Venue Object

| Argument     | Type   | Requirement | Description                                | Maximum Length |
| ------------ | ------ | ----------- | ------------------------------------------ | -------------- |
| name         | String | Required    | Name of the venue                          | 255            |
| country_id   | Int    | Required    | Id of the country in which venue reside in |                |
| parent_type  | String | Required    | Can be Company or Chain                    |                |
| parent_id    | int    | Required    | Company Id, Chain Id                       | 10             |
| language_id  | int    | Required    | Language Id                                | 10             |
| timezone     | string | Required    | Timezone of the venue                      | 50             |
| description           | string                          | Optional            | Venue description                                                                         | n/a            |
| welcome_message       | string                          | Optional            | Welcome message                                                                           | n/a            |
| address               | string                          | Optional            | Street name and number                                                                    | 255            |
| is_demo               | bool                            | Required            | Is venue demo - true/false                                                                | n/a            |
| state                 | int                             | Default - 1         | active/not active  - 0/1                                                                  | n/a            |
| city                  | string                          | Optional            | Name of the city                                                                          | 255            |
| zip                   | string                          | Required            | City post / zip code                                                                      | 11             |
| latitude              | decimal                         | Optional            | Map location - latitude                                                                   | 11,8           |
| longitude             | decimal                         | Optional            | Map location - longitude                                                                  | 11,8           |
| tax_number            | string                          | Optional            | Tax / VAT number of the venue                                                             | 30             |
| phone                 | string                          | Optional            | Venue phone number                                                                        | 30             |
| is_in_marketplace     | bool                            |  Default - true     | Will venue be listed/shown in the marketplace - true/false                                | n/a            |
| allow_item_comments   | bool                            | Default -  false    | Does comments on items allowed or not                                                     | n/a            |
| calculation_method    | enum  - 'inclusive'/'exclusive' | Default - inclusive | How taxes are calculated - inclusive/exclusive                                            | n/a            |
| images                | object                          | Optional            | Splash image of the venue, object contains: thumbnail_small, thumbnail_medium, fullsize   | n/a            |

item.description:
This call is used to enable or disable a resource.

Meaning of the state in database : 1 - Enabled, 2 - Disabled, 3 - Auto-disabled	

## Format of API call:

```
{{BASE_URL}}/api/{{resource}}/{{id}}/state/enable
```


## List of applicable resurces that can be activated/deactivated

| Applicable Resources      |
| ------------------------- |
| areas                     |
| categories                |
| chains                    |
| core-categories           |
| core-item-price-levels    |
| core-items                |
| core-menus                |
| core-subcategories        |
| customer-accounts         |
| menu-item-price-levels    |
| menu-items                |
| menu-languages            |
| menus                     |
| modifier-groups           |
| modifiers                 |
| subcategories             |
| tables                    |
| venues                    |
| areas                     |
| categories
| news
| order-types               |

request.description:
Order statistics.
If no filter is selected it will return all orders for that venue.
Can be filtered by date period, area, or order type, or can be selected one specific order by code.

Filter example 1:
{
"time_from": "2018-08-01 00:00:00",
"time_to": "2018-12-05 23:59:59",
"areas": [208],
"order_types": [2]
}
Filter example 2:
{
"code": "3AEK3",
}

request.description:
Order statistics.
If no filter is selected it will return all orders for that venue.
Can be filtered by date period, area, or order type, or can be selected one specific order by code.

Filter example 1:
{
"time_from": "2018-08-01 00:00:00",
"time_to": "2018-12-05 23:59:59",
"areas": [208],
"order_types": [2]
}
Filter example 2:
{
"code": "3AEK3",
}

request.description:
Export order statistics to xls.
If no filter is selected it will return all orders for that venue.
Can be filtered by date period, area, or order type, or can be selected one specific order by code.

Filter example 1:
{
"time_from": "2018-08-01 00:00:00",
"time_to": "2018-12-05 23:59:59",
"areas": [208],
"order_types": [2]
}

{
"code": "3AEK3",
}

item.description:
Each country is assigned a currency and determines in what currency restaurants within that country will make payments. Also every payment processor has a list of supported currencies.

# Currency Object

| Argument            | Type   | Requirement | Description                                                                              | Maximum Length |
| ------------------- | ------ | ------------| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |----------------|
| code                | string | Required   |ISO-4217 alpha currency code                                                              | 3 |
| symbol              | string | Required   |Currency symbol                                                                           | 5 |
| rounding_unit       | float  | Required   |Rounding unit in steps: 0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 5, 10, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 5000          | per description |
| rounding_unit_tip   | float  | Required   |Rounding unit for tips in steps: 0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 5, 10, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 5000 | per description |

item.description:
A Company represents a legal entity that owns single venues and/or chains. The main concepts of a Company are its Users, its Venues & Chains, its Brands and its Statistics.

A Company may be created by an Administrator or a Success Manager. On company creation user (CompanyManager) can be created as optional, if data is provided.

# Company Object

| Argument         | Type    | Requirement | Description                         | Maximum Length |
| ---------------- | ------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name             | String  | Required    | Company name                        | 100            |
| address          | String  | Required    | Company address                     | 150            |
| postal_code      | String  | Required    | Company postal code                 | 11             |
| city             | String  | Optional    | Company city                        |     NA         |
| country_id       | Integer | Required    | Id of the country company reside in | 10             |
| company_manager  | Object  | Optional    | User which will manage the company  |     NA         |

# Company manager Object

| Argument | Type   | Requirement | Description                              | Maximum Length |
| -------- | ------ | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name     | String | Required    | Company manager's name                   | 200            |
| email    | String | Required    | Company manager's email                  | 255            |
| password | String | Required    | Log-in password for company manager user | 80             |
| language | String | Optional    | Id of the company manager's language     | 2              |

item.description:
A restaurant is assigned to it's country, which determines a variety of different attributes, which are managed centrally throughout the platform.

# Countries Object

| Argument           | Type   | Requirement | Description                | Maximum Length |
| ------------------ | ------ | ------------| ------------------------------------------|----------------|
| name               | string | Required  | Name of the country                 | 255        |
| code               | string   | Required  | ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code       | 2        |
| calling_code       | int    | Required  | International dial code for the country   | 5        |
| currency_settings  | object | Required  | Currency Settings Object                  |   n/a       |


# Currency Settings Object

| Argument             | Type    | Requirement   | Description                                                                             | Maximum Length |
| -------------------- | ------- | ------------  | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| currency_space       | boolean | Required    | Indicates whether there is a space between the currency symbol and the number - 'true' or 'false' | n/a        |
| symbol_position      | string  | Required    | If currency symbol is positioned before (left) or after price (right)  - 'left' or 'right'        | n/a        |
| decimal_separator    | string  | Required    | Separator for decimal point. Either . or ,                                              | n/a        |
| thousands_separator  | string  | Required    | Separator for prices > 1000. Either . , or '                                            | n/a         |

item.description:
Serving times are implemented for Venues, Areas, Categories and Subcategories.
To change between these entities, just change the first resource name in the route:
{{BASE_URL}}/api/venues/1/serving-times/1
{{BASE_URL}}/api/areas/1/serving-times/3
{{BASE_URL}}/api/categories/1/serving-times/5
{{BASE_URL}}/api/subcategories/1/serving-times/7

Note: Make sure your ID of the serving time matches the parent resource. For example if you look for a serving time in a wrong venue, and the serving time is related to another venue, you will get a message that a resource doesn't exist.

# Serving Time Object

- When you wan to specify from/to dates:
 
| Argument   | Type    | Requirement | Description                                                              | Maximum Length |
| ---------- | ------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------- |
| time_from  | string  | Optional    | Time from when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value) | 5              |
| time_to    | string  | Optional    | Time to when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value)   | 5              |
| date       | string  | Optional    | Date from when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value) | min 10 max 10                |
| date_to    | string  | Optional    | Date to when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value)   | min 10 max 10  |
| working    | boolean | Required    | Specify if we are setting time to working or not working                 | true/false     |

- When you want to specify week days (Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun):

| Argument   | Type    | Requirement | Description                                                                                   | Maximum Length |
| ---------- | ------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| time_from  | string  | Optional    | Time from when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value)                      | 5              |
| time_to    | string  | Optional    | Time to when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value)                        | 5              |
| days       | array   | Optional    | Week days from when venue is working/not working (depends on 'working' value) - 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 | n/a            |
| working    | boolean | Required    | Specify if we are setting time to working or not working                                      | true/false     |

request.description:
Create a MenuItem for the specified subcategory resource.

If the clone_id field is not passed, name is required, tax_id will default to the first available venue tax, preparation_time will default to 1.

If the clone_id field is available, this will be the id of an existing core_item that does not yet have a related menu_item in the specified menu. No other fields are required if clone_id is passed.

The modifier_groups parameter is optional and can be used to create an ItemModifierGroup that is permanently tied to the MenuItem.

item.description:
Menu items are the core element of a venue's menu and they represent an entity that can be added to order by a customer. Menu item can have one or more price levels.

| Argument          | Type    | Requirement | Description                                                         | Maximum Length |
| ----------------- | ------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name              | String  | Required    | Menu item name                                                      | 100            |
| description       | String  | Optional    | Description of the menu item                                        | n/a            |
| tax_id            | Integer | Required    | Id of a tax which is applied to the menu item                       | 10             |
| subcategory_id    | Integer | Optional    | Should be used only on update, if want to move to other subcategory | n/a            |
| preparation_time  | Integer | Optional    | Time needed to prepare the item               | 11             |
| price_levels | Array | Required | Price Levels being added to the item | |
| price_levels.id | Integer | Optional | Id of an existing price level to update. If not provided, a new price level will be created | 10 |
| price_levels.name | String | Required/Optional | Required if more than one price level is being added | 100 | 
| price_levels.price | Integer | Required | The price of the price level in cents | 5 |

item.description:
Subcategories are in the middle of venue menu hierarchy. Subcategory contains menu item and are created inside a menu category.

| Argument                | Type                            | Requirement | Description                                                                          | Maximum Length |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------         | -------------- |
| name                    | String                          | Required    | Subcategory name                                                                     | 255            |
| type                    | Enum ('Food', 'Drink', 'Other') | Required    | Type of menu items withing this subcategory                                          | n/a            |
| introduction            | String                          | Optional    | Introduction for the subcategory that will be presented to customer                  | n/a            |
| hide_when_not_served    | Integer                         | Optional    | Should subcategory be visible to customer when not served (yes '1', not '0')         | 1              |
| category_id             | Integer                         | Optional    | Should be used only on update, if want to move current subcategory to other category | n/a            |

item.description:
Categories are the highest element in the venue menu hierarchy. Category type can be:  food, drink or other.

| Argument                | Type                            | Requirement | Description                                              | Maximum Length |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name                    | string                          | Required    | Id of the category                                   | 100            |
| type                    | enum ('Food', 'Drink', 'Other') | Required    | Type of the category                                     | n/a            |
| description             | string                          | Optional    | Description of the category                              | 100            |
| hide_when_not_served    | Integer (default '0')              | Optional    | Should category be visible to customer when not served (yes '1', not '0') | 1              |

request.description:
Create a MenuItem for the specified subcategory resource.

If the clone_id field is not passed, name is required, tax_id will default to the first available venue tax, preparation_time will default to 1.

If the clone_id field is available, this will be the id of an existing core_item that does not yet have a related menu_item in the specified menu. No other fields are required if clone_id is passed.

The modifier_groups parameter is optional and can be used to create an ItemModifierGroup that is permanently tied to the MenuItem.

response.name: Store

request.description:
Update an existing MenuItem resource.

The modifier_groups parameter is optional and can be used to create an ItemModifierGroup that is permanently tied to the MenuItem.

response.name: Update

header.description: Application Key

request.description: Map POS item to core-item and it's price levels

item.description:
CoreItems

| Argument           | Type    | Requirement       | Description                                                                                 | Maximum Length |
| -----------------  | ------- | -----------       | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name               | String  | Required          | Menu item name                                                                              | 100            |
| description        | String  | Optional          | Description of the menu item                                                                | n/a            |
| core_tax_id        | Integer | Required          | Id of core_tax, if it is not provided, first core_tax_id from chain will be used            | 10             |
| subcategory_id     | Integer | Optional          | Should be used only on update, if want to move to other subcategory                         | n/a            |
| preparation_time   | Integer | Optional          | Time needed to prepare the item                                                             | 11             |
| price_levels       | Array   | Required          | Price Levels being added to the item                                                        |                |
| price_levels.id    | Integer | Optional          | Id of an existing price level to update. If not provided, a new price level will be created | 10             |
| price_levels.name  | String  | Required/Optional | Required if more than one price level is being added                                        | 100            | 
| price_levels.price | Integer | Required          | The price of the price level in cents                                                       | 5              |

| Argument                | Type                            | Requirement | Description                                              | Maximum Length |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name                    | string                          | Required    | Id of the sub category                                   | 100            |
| type                    | enum ('Food', 'Drink', 'Other') | Required    | Type of the category                                     | n/a            |
| description             | string                          | Optional    | Description of the category                              | 100            |
| hide_when_not_served    | Bool (default '0')              | Optional    | If category is hidden when not served (yes '1', not '0') | 1              |
| print_on_order          | Bool (default '1')              | Optional    |                                                          | 1              |

Update a category in the specified menu.

No fields are required for update. If not specified in the JSON body they will default to their existing values in the database.

response.name: Update

request.description: Delete the specified category.
Restore the specified deleted category.

item.description:
# CoreCategories

Create a CoreCategory in the specified CoreMenu.

| Argument                | Type                            | Requirement | Description                                              | Maximum Length |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name                    | string                          | Required    | Id of the sub category                                   | 100            |
| type                    | enum ('Food', 'Drink', 'Other') | Required    | Type of the category                                     | n/a            |
| description             | string                          | Optional    | Description of the category                              | 100            |
| hide_when_not_served    | Bool (default '0')              | Optional    | If category is hidden when not served (yes '1', not '0') | 1              |
| print_on_order          | Bool (default '1')              | Optional    |                                                          | 1              |

request.description:
Store an image for the specified resource.

The format of this request is {resource_type}/{resource_id}/images.

The allowed resource types are: venues, subcategories, menu-items, brands, modifiers and combo-items.
For modifiers image must be in 1/1 ratio.

A local variable named base64 should be created and filled with base64 image code. This can be obtained by uploading an image at https://www.base64-image.de/

item.description:
An application is a consumer of the MENU API, that authenticates itself with it's API Key in the Header of its HTTP request. All applications are managed on a global-level.

# Application Object

| Argument        | Type   | Requirement              | Description                                                                                                       | Maximum Length |
| --------------- | ------ | ------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| type_id         | int    | Required                 | Type of application - Only available type for now is ('5') or "Specific Mobile Application", other types (which are not currenctly being used) are - cms ('1'), mobile ('2'), tablet ('3'), webapp ('4')                                          | 10             |
| reference_type  | string | Required                 | Type of application                                                                                               | 50             |
| brand_id        | int    | Required                 | id of the brand that the application belongs to                                                                   | 10             |
| name            | string | Required                 | Application name                                                                                                  | 255            |
| key             | string | Required                 | API key that the application will use to authenticate with the MENU API and that will determine its access rights | 255            |

request.description:
Stores Omnivore VenueIntegration if not exits, or updates existing, and returning Omnivore VenueIntegration object

# Venue Integration Object

| Atribute                        | Type   | Description                                              |
| ------------------------------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| pos_type                        | string | POS Type (example "micros 3700") |
| location_id                     | string | POS location Id                                          |
| menu_tender_type_id             | string | Tender Type Id                                           |
| cache_tender_type_id            | string | Cache Tender Type Id                                     |
| payment_status_item_id          | string | Payment Status Item Id                                   |
| in_venue_revenue_id             | string | In Venue Revenue Id                                      |
| in_venue_order_type             | string | In Venue Order Type                                      |
| takeout_revenue_id              | string | Takeout Revenue Id                                       |
| takeout_order_type              | string | Takeout Order Type                                       |
| tray_charge_item_id             | string | Tray Charge Item Id                                      |
| tray_charge_price_level_id      | string | Tray Charge Price Level Id                               |
| zero_price_modifier_id          | int    | POS's zero price modifier id                             |
| allow_multiple_table_tickets    | bool   | Determines whether every order placed through MENU app will create new ticket on POS or not. If value is true than every order creates new ticket.          |

request.description:
Create a new modifier resource for the specified venue.

Three types of modifiers exist. The type_id values are as follows.

type_id 1 = SimpleModifier (this is the equivalent of v2 modifiers)

type_id 2 = ItemModifier (these are items that are being used as modifiers)

type_id 3 = CommentModifier (these are meant to handle preparation instructions as certain POS systems treat these different to modifiers. Price will always be set to 0)

item.description:
Endpoints for listing and handling modifiers

## Modifier Object

| Argument     | Type   | Requirement   | Description                             | Maximum Length |
| ------------ | ------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name         | int    | Required      | Name of the modifier                    | 100            |
| price        | int    | Required      | Price of the modifier                   | 10             |
| pos_id       | string | Optional      | POS id of the modifier                  | 100            |
| pos_name     | string | Optional      | Name of the modifier on the POS         | 100            |
| state        | int    | Default - '1' | State of the modifier (active/inactive) | 3              |
| translations | object | n/a           | Modifier's translations                 | n/a            |

item.description:
Endpoints related to venue Modifier Groups.

## Modifier Group Object

| Argument           | Type   | Requirement   | Description                                              | Maximum Length |
| ------------------ | ------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| type_id             | int    | Required      | type_id=1 Standard modifier group; type_id=2 Item specific modifier group                               | 5              |
| name               | string | Required      | Name of the modifier group                               | 100            |
| min_selected       | int    | Default - '0' | Minimum number of selected modifiers in the group        | 5              |
| max_selected       | int    | Default - '0' | Maximum number of selected modifiers in the group        | 5              |
| pos_max_selected   | int    | Default - '0' | Maximum number of selected modifiers on POS in the group | 5              |
| pos_id             | string | Optional      | POS of the modifier group                                | 100            |
| pos_name           | string | Optional      | POS name of the modifier group                           | 100            |
| translations       | object | Optional      | Translations object                                      | n/a            |
| state              | int    | Default - '1' | State of the modifier group (enabled/disabled)           | 3              |

item.description:
| Argument              | Type    | Required | Maximum length | Description                                                                                 |
| --------------------- | ------- | -------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| name                  | String  | Yes      | 255            |                                                                                             |
| company_id            | Integer | Yes      | n/a            | Id of company, which this chain belongs to.                                                 |
| language_id           | Integer | Yes      | n/a            | Default language of  menu in venues within a chain.                                         |
| tip_default           | Integer | No       | n/a            | Default tip amount in venues within this chain                                              |
| tip_max               | Integer | No       | n/a            | Maximum tip amount in venues within this chain                                              |
| service_charge        | Double  | No       | n/a            | Amount of service charge in venues within this chain                                        |
| cuisine               | String  | No       | 255            | Type of cuisine in venues  within this chain e.g. Spanish                                   |
| is_in_marketplace     | Boolean | No       | 1              | Would venues within a chain be seen in app directory                                        |
| allow_item_comments   | Boolean | No       | 1              | Determines if it is allowed to add comments when ordering items in venues within this Chain |

| Argument     | Type   | Requirement | Description                                                                                                                                                                   | Maximum Length |
| ------------ | ------ | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| parent_id    | int    | Required    | Id of the Parent Type (for example "Venue") that has language assigned for. Not specified in body of the call, but specified in the API call's path and returned in response. | 10             |
| parent_type  | string | Required    | Parent Type (for example "Venue") that has language assigned for. Not specified in body of the call, but specified in the API call's path and returned in response.           | 255            |
| name         | string | Required    | Language name                                                                                                                                                                 | 255            |
| code         | string | Required    | Language code (2-letter ISO code)                                                                                                                                                      | 255            |
| is_default   | int    | Default '0' | Is language default ('1') or not ('0')                                                                                                                                        | 1              |
| state        | int    | Default '1' | Disabled ('0') or Enabled ('1')                                                                                                                                               | 3              |

item.description:
Each translated object contains translation object where we define name of the atribute and translation text. In Fetch All API call, which atributes can be translated are returned in 'translatable_attributes'

## Translation Object

| Argument           | Type   | Requirement | Description                                                                  | Maximum Length |
| ------------------ | ------ | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| menu_language_id   | int    | Required    | ID of the language                                                           | 10             |
| attribute          | string | Required    | Attribute for which we define translation. Translatable attributes for Venue ('description', 'name', 'welcome message'); for CoreItem ('description', 'name'); for CoreItemPriceLevel ('name'); for CoreSubcategory  ('introduction', 'name'); for CoreCategory ('description', 'name'); | 255 ;    |
| translations       | string | Required    | Translation text                                                             | n/a            |

request.description:
Store new Discount Group.


| Attribute                                | Type     | Requirement | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| type_id                						       | int      | Required    | The type ID of the Discount group. Determines what type of objects (menu items or combo meals) can be added to it. Valid type_id values: 1 = Item, 2 = Combo. |
| name                   						       | string   | Required    | The name of the Discount Group. |
| discount_objects       						       | array    | Optional    | List of discount objects that belong to the Discount group. |
| discount_objects.core_objects 		       | array    | Optional    | List of core objects (core items or core combo items) related to the discount object. For each discount object, there should be exactly one core object for each business unit (venue/chain) that supports the parent discount. |
| discount_objects.core_objects.id 	       | int      | Required    | The ID of the core object. In an Item Discount Group (type_id = 1), it represents the ID of a core item, while in an Combo Discount Group (type_id = 2) it's the ID of a core combo item from the main combo group. |
| discount_objects.core_objects.properties | array    | Optional    | Specific core object properties. For core items it will be the price level ID to which discount is applied. |

request.description:
Store new Discount.

| Attribute              | Type     | Requirement              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------- | -------- | ------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| type_id                | int      | Required                 | The type ID of the Discount. Valid type_id values: 1 = Coupon, 2 = Reward. |
| name                   | string   | Required                 | The name of the Discount. |
| description            | string   | Optional                 | Brief Discount description. |
| reduction_type         | int      | Required                 | The type ID of the price reduction. Valid values: 1 = Set Price, 2 = Amount Off, 3 = Percentage Off.|
| reduction_price   		 | int      | Required (conditionally) | Reduction value when the 'Set Price' reduction type is used. Required when reduction type_id = 1. |
| max_redemption_count   | int      | Optional                 | The maximum number of discount redemption per customer account and/or device ID. If null, discount will have unlimited redemption count. |
| date_from              | date     | Optional                 | Date when the discount becomes active. If null, discount will be active right after it's created. |
| date_to                | date     | Optional                 | Date when the discount becomes inactive. If null, discount will remain active indefinitely. |
| is_registered_only     | boolean  | Optional                 | Determines if disocunt will be available only to registered customers. |
| channels               | array    | Required                 | List of discount channels supported by the Discount. |
| channels.type_id       | int      | Required                 | The type ID of the discount channel. Valid type_id values: 1 = POS, 2 = Kiosk, 3 = Mobile, 4 = Web. |
| channels.properties    | array    | Required (conditionally) | Specific discount channel properties. For POS discount channel type, `pos_redemption_code` property is required. |

  "name": "Lord of the Fries",
  "description": "Collect points and launch your journey as the Foodie Magnate, the Baron of Eats, the Lord of the Fries",
  "point_name": "Rugi",
  "points_per_unit": 20,
  "unit": 1,
  "point_limit": 250,
  "registration_points": 10,
  "allow_for_pos": true,
  "allow_for_kiosk": false
}

item.description:
Venue groups are comprised of two or more restaurants. Every restaurant in a venue group can only have one active (enabled) area.


## Venue Group Object

| Argument         | Type   | Requirement | Description                         | Maximum Length |
| ---------------- | ------ | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name             | string | Required    | Name of the venue group             | 255            |
| welcome_message  | string | Optional    | Welcome message for the venue group | n/a            |

item.description:
## Printer Object

| Argument              | Type   | Requirement   | Description                                                                 | Maximum Length |
| --------------------- | ------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| name                  | string | Required      | Name of the printer                                                         | 255            |
| password              | string | Optional      | Printer password (unused?)                                                  | 255            |
| type_id               | int    | Required      | Master ('1') or Child ('2')                                                 | 11             |
| master_printer_id     | int    | Optional      | ID of the master printer (when adding child printer master must be defined) | 10             |
| device_id             | string | Optional      | Id of the device (set in webconfig)                                         | 255            |
| web_config_password   | string | Optional      | The password of the Master printer (in Epson webconfig)                     | 255            |
| cc_printer         | int    | Default - '0'      | If ('1') orders made on other printers will also print to this printer               | 1             |
| cc_printer_message    | string | Optional      | Message to be printed on cc ('carbon copy') printer, if cc_printer is true this is required                         | 255            |
| is_alternative        | int    | Default - '0' | Is printer alternative ('1') or not ('0')                                   | 1              |
| is_backup             | int    | Default - '0' | Is printer backup ('1') or not ('0')                                        | 1              |
| print_summary_chit    | int    | Default - '1' | Option to print summary chit                                                | 1              |

item.description:
## Tablet Object Tablet must be created insade of venue, one venue can have multiple tablets.
Tablet can be assinged to an area, one area can have only one tablet, one tablet can be assinged to multiple areas.
When updating tablet, areas assinged to that tablet will be synced.
You can assign tablet to areas only from venue tablet belongs to.
Only Take Out and Quick Service areas allow assigning tablet to them. | Argument | Type | Requirement | Description | Maximum Length | | --------------------- | ------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- | | name | string | Required | Name of the tablet | 255 | | token | string | Required | Tablet token, unique | 6 | | notifications | bool | Optional | Tablet notifications on ('1') or off ('0'), Default - ('1') | 1 | | areas | array | Optional | Array of area ids that you what to assign tablet to | NA |

item.description:
Business Unit is a common name for Venues and Chains. Every entity that has a relation with these entities should be able to use those requests for easily management.

At this moment resources that can use these requests are:
- Applications => "applications"
